p: Acetaminophen is the preferred antipyretic for fever. Prescribing Aspirin and other nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs in ZIKV is usually not acceptable, but may be prescribed cautiously after eliminating dengue virus infection (avoidance of hemorrhagic complications).[ 76] Aspirin should be avoided in pregnancy beyond the 32 nd week of gestation due to possible premature arterial duct closure and young children (<12 years) to prevent the risk of Reye's syndrome.[ 76 93]
